Title: Task Bar Manager
Description: The WinForm .NET application that allow user to control Windows system's task bar.
HomeWiki:
Task Bar Manager

A simple WinForm .NET application with which user can
  • show the normal or auto-hiding Windows task bar
  • hide the task bar
  • set its auto hiding property
  • set its on top of all property (not supported in such systems as Windows 8.x)

It is especially useful for some Windows 8 tablets when used in tablet mode and task bar's auto hide mode is on.
It becomes handy if it's been added to the desktop or start screen (depending on the user's preference) and when the hidden task bar needs to be raised the user just launches the app (from desktop or start screen) and clicks the 'Show ...' button.
